Bihar State Eligibility Test STET Online Form 2025

The Bihar State Eligibility Test (Bihar STET) 2025 is a state-level examination organized by the Bihar School Examination Board (BSEB). It is conducted to evaluate and certify the eligibility of candidates aspiring to become teachers in government schools across Bihar. Qualifying this exam is a mandatory requirement for applying to teaching positions for Classes 9 to 12 in the state.
37 Years for Male & 40 Years for Female
Graduation Degree in Related Subject with 50% Marks and B.Ed Exam Passed
Graduation Degree / Post Graduation Degree with Minimum 45% Marks (As per NCTE Norms) with B.Ed.
Post Graduation Degree in Related Subject and B.Ed Exam Passed
4 Year Course BA BEd / BSc BEd Exam Passed
Note: For Subject Wise More Eligibility Kindly Read Notification.
Post Graduation Degree with Minimum 45% Marks (As per NCTE Norms) with B.Ed.
Post Graduation Degree in Related Subject with 50% Marks and B.Ed Exam / BA BEd / BSc BEd Passed
Post Graduation Degree with 55% Marks and 3 Year B.Ed MEd Course
Payment Mode: Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking
1. Passport Size Candidate Photo (White Background Clean Photo)

The Bihar State Eligibility Test (Bihar STET) 2025 is a state-level examination conducted by the Bihar School Examination Board (BSEB) to assess the eligibility of candidates for teaching positions in government schools across Bihar.
Bihar State Eligibility Test STET Online Form 2025 Syllabus
BSEB Bihar State Eligibility Test 2025 Syllabus
The Bihar STET 2025 comprises two papers:
General Aptitude: 50 marks (including Art of Teaching, General Knowledge, Environmental Science, Mathematical Aptitude, Logical Reasoning)
Hindi, English, Urdu, Bengali, Maithili, Sanskrit, Arabic, Farsi, Bhojpuri, Mathematics, Science, Social Science, Special Education, Physical Education, Fine Arts, Dance
📗 Paper II – For Classes 11–12 (Senior Secondary Level)

Hindi, English, Urdu, Bengali, Maithili, Sanskrit, Magahi, Pali, Prakrit, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, History, Geography, Political Science, Sociology, Economics, Philosophy, Psychology, Home Science, Arabic, Farsi, Bhojpuri, Mathematics, Commerce, Computer Science, Agriculture, Music
Teaching methodologies, child development, learning processes, and curriculum design.
Current affairs, history, geography, and general awareness.
Basic mathematical skills and problem-solving abilities.
Science: Basic concepts in physics, chemistry, biology.
Special Education: Principles and practices in special education.
Physical Education: Fundamentals of physical education and sports.
Fine Arts & Dance: Basic concepts and techniques.
Social Sciences: History, geography, political science, sociology, economics.
Commerce: Financial accounting, business studies, economics, management.
Computer Science: Programming, data structures, computer applications.
